title: Jasper Philipsen Makes a Statement with Kuurne Blowout Win
content:
Belgian Philipsen triumphs on his birthday, denying Kooij and Hofsetter and showing fine form before defense of his Milan-San Remo title.

Read the full article at Jasper Philipsen Makes a Statement with Kuurne Blowout Win on Velo.
author: sstokes
